programme.desc: : eflects the humorous realities of everyday Filipino life, highlighting family values that help the lead characters to face challenges with optimism, and celebrating the special, happy moments - big or small- that we all aspire to share with our l, oved ones. Pepito Manaloto: Tuloy Ang Kuwento: "PEPITO MANALOTO, TULOY ANG KUWENTO" is the continuing comedic chronicle of the life of Pepito Manaloto, a lucky multimillion lotto winner, his family, and the merry mix of neighbors and colleagues.
